= Intro =
This plugin list is linked to from the [http://saplink.org SAPlink code page], with the goal of containing a full list of available plugins.  If you have an available plugin that you would like to add to the list, please contact the project owners.

= SAPlink Plugins =

== Alpha ==
  * [http://saplink-plugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ABAP%20Web%20Dynpro/ ABAP Web Dynpro] 
    _Note: The ABAP web dynpro requires the latest development version of the core [http://saplink.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Core%20Slinkees/CLAS_ZSAPLINK.slnk SAPlink class].  Without updating first, you will get an error message during plugin install regarding a missing PRESERVEVERSION flag. You can [http://saplink.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Core%20Slinkees/CLAS_ZSAPLINK.slnk download] and upgrade the core SAPlink class via SAPlink. Please report any issues with this plugin directly on the plugin page that it is hosted on_
